FORM.  1. FORM A - ENLISTED MEN 2. FORM A - OFFICERS 3. FORM B - ENLISTED MEN 4. FORM B - OFFICERS
Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. NON-COM (CORPORAL OR ANY GRADE OF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN) 4. SOME OTHER RANK OR GRADE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT GRADE*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 29 YEARS 4. 30 TO 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY* E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.6. IN WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
Q.7. IN WHICH OF THE ARMY FORCES DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIME*  1. ARMY AIR FORCES 2. ARMY GROUND FORCES 3. ARMY SERVICE FORCES 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8A. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8B. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I,M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY*  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED AFTER PEARL HARBOR 3. I VOLUNTEERED BEFORE PEARL HARBOR 4. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 5. I WAS IN THE E.R.C. (ENLISTED RESERVE) 6. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER
Q.10A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
Q.10B. IF YES, HOW LONG DID YOU SERVE OVERSEAS*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.10C. IF YES, HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR*  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A AND 11B NOT CODED.
Q.12. HOW MANY POINTS TOWARD DISCHARGE DO YOU HAVE OFFICIALLY*  ANP 01. 1 POINT . . . 89. 89 POINTS 90.90-99 POINTS 91.100-119 POINTS 92.120 POINTS AND OVER 93.DON,T KNOW 00.NO ANSWER

Q.13. HAS THE ARMY AT ANY TIME CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MAN*  1. YES, I WAS CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 2. NO, I WAS NEVER CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 3. I DON,T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS EVER CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER
Q.14A. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, ARE YOU NOW CLASSIFIED BY THE ARMY AS PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY*  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON,T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.14B. IN YOUR OWN OPINION, ARE YOU PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.15. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME*  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 16 NOT CODED.

Q.17. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. ON A FARM 2. IN THE COUNTRY BUT NOT ON A FARM 3. IN A VILLAGE WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 4. IN A SMALL CITY WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 6. IN A LARGE CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.18. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY* (CHECK AS MANY AS YOU WERE DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY.)  01. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER, FOR SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION 02. GOING TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 03. FARMING (EITHER WITH YOUR FAMILY OR FOR YOURSELF) 04. HAD MY OWN BUSINESS (DID NOT RECEIVE SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION) 05. LOOKING FOR A JOB 06. WORKING PART-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER 07. GOING TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 08. SOMETHING ELSE (EDITED TO LIST, NOT CONSIDERED ONE OF A DOUBLE CHECK) 09. I WAS IN THE REGULAR ARMY 10. DOUBLE CHECKS 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

Q.20. WHETHER YOU ARE A CHURCH MEMBER OR NOT, DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF:  1. CATHOLIC 2. JEWISH 3. PROTESTANT (FOR EXAMPLE, BAPTIST, METHODIST ETC.) 4. OTHER (FOR EXAMPLE, MORMON, ORTHODOX, JEHOVAH,S WITNESSES, AGNOSTIC, ETC.) 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART I***************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY DISCHARGE PLAN:

Q.21. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

Q.22. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE*  1. YES, I THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON,T THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.23. HERE ARE FOUR STATEMENTS OF OPINION ABOUT THE POINT SYSTEM. CHECK THE ONE WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OPINION.  1. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 2. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 3. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 4. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 5. I DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW HARD IS THE ARMY TRYING TO SPEED UP THE DISCHARGE OF ENLISTED MEN*  1. THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. THE ARMY IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THE ARMY IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. HAVE YOU HEARD OR READ ANYTHING ABOUT THE POSSIBILITY OF THE FOLLOWING CHANGE BEING MADE IN THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN - ALL ENLISTED MEN WITH TWO YEARS OR MORE SERVICE TO BE DISCHARGED IN THE NEAR FUTURE, REGARDLESS OF HOW MANY POINTS THEY HAVE*  1. YES, I HAVE HEARD OF THIS 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HEARD OF THIS BEFORE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER P. THE ARMY AIR FORCES HAS ANNOUNCED THAT THE FOLLOWING MEN IN THE A.A.F. ARE ELIGIBLE FOR SEPARATION: ENLISTED MEN NOW IN THE U.S. WHO HAVE 45 POINTS AND 2 YEARS OR MORE OF SERVICE, PROVIDED THEY DO NOT HAVE A CRITICAL MOS. ENLISTED MEN NOW IN THE U.S. WITH 42 MONTHS OR MORE OF SERVICE, REGARDLESS OF THEIR POINT SCORE.
Q.26A. DID YOU KNOW ABOUT THIS DISCHARGE PLAN FOR THE ARMY AIR FORCES - WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM THE DISCHARGE PLAN FOR OTHER SOLDIERS*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.26B. DO YOU APPROVE OR DISAPPROVE OF THIS DISCHARGE PLAN FOR THE ARMY AIR FORCES*  1. I APPROVE 2. I DISAPPROVE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. NOW THAT THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING OR SHOULD WE GO BACK TO THE REGULAR ARMY SYSTEM OF TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY*  1. DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING 2. GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART II**************************** P. THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE BY DIFFERENT SOLDIERS ABOUT THE ARMY: READ EACH STATEMENT CAREFULLY. YOU WILL FIND THAT YOU AGREE WITH SOME AND DISAGREE WITH OTHERS. IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU AGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD "AGREE". IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU DISAGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORKD "DISAGREE". THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. THE ONLY ANSWER TO GIVE IS YOUR OWN HONEST OPINION.

Q.88. "ONE GOOD THING ABOUT THE ARMY IS THE FACT THAT YOU DON,T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT WHAT OTHER PEOPLE THINK OF YOU*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER ****************************PART III**************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT SEVERAL DIFFERENT TOPICS:

Q.1. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU THINK MOST NON-COMS TEND TO LOOK AT THINGS - FROM THE OFFICER,S POINT OF VIEW OR THE ENLISTED MAN,S POINT OF VIEW*  1. FROM THE OFFICER,S POINT OF VIEW 2. FROM THE ENLISTED MAN,S POINT OF VIEW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.2. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING KINDS OF OUTFITS WOULD YOU PERSONALLY PREFER TO BE IN*  1. AN OUTFIT WITH GOOD NON-COMS BUT POOR OFFICERS 2. AN OUTFIT WITH GOOD OFFICERS BUT POOR NON-COMS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.3. IF WHILE THE WAR WAS ON A SISTER OR GIRL FRIEND OF YOUR,S WAS THINKING OF JOINING THE WACS, WOULD YOU HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN OR NOT TO JOIN*  1. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER TO JOIN 2. I WOULD HAVE ADVISED HER NOT TO JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
